Items.Name: Prince
Items.Comment: Jobex Events is the best event planning, catering services, accommodation & rentals services any company can ever imagine. Just send your request and it's done.

Items.Title: Welcome to Jobex Ghana
Items.Description: Jobex Company Limited (JCL) was set up by a team of professionals in the corporate world and is a limited liability firm focused on serving the comprehensive needs of individuals and businesses in the full range of the business cycle.

Items.Title: Engineering Services
Items.Description: We undertake complete installation services for Emergency Lighting Power Systems, Fire, Security, CCTV, Access Control Systems, Electric Fencing, Computers, Telecommunication Networking and Electricals.

Items.Title: Procurement and Supply
Items.Description: We undertake supply of quality items such as electronic equipments, stationery, water tanks, various plastic products, hampers and general goods as per client requests and in an effective and timely manner.

Items.Title: Business Plan Development
Items.Description: We have externally focused business plans, which are plans targeting goals that are important to external stakeholders, particularly financial stakeholders (Banks, Investors and other local and international financial institutions).

Items.Title: Filing of Statutory Returns
Items.Description: We prepare and file returns on behalf of our clientele in a timely manner e.gs of such statutory returns are: Income Tax, Social Security and National Insurance Trust, Withholding tax and Value Added Tax returns.

AboutInfo.Title: About Us
AboutInfo.Description: We have a great story on how our products and services were built to change lives.
AboutInfo.Detail:
Jobex Company Limited (JCL) is emerging as one of Ghana's leading supplier in the Mining industry with over 10 years unparalleled mining experience. It is a limited liability firm focused on serving the comprehensive needs of various sectors and providing comprehensive technical advisory and product information to the mining and other industry in the full range of the business cycle. 

JCL offers a more balanced quality service than most of its competitors leveraging on a good international exposure, cross cultural experience with multinational companies and industry knowledge.
JCL has always been value driven with set up of experience, skilled and experts who specializes in specific disciplines, including Supply Chain, finance, management, operations, sales and marketing, civil engineering & construction, technology, and human resources.

The company has its corporate office in Accra, Ghana in West Africa and was incorporated on the 24th of April, 2009.

GalleryInfo.Title: Our Gallery
GalleryInfo.Description: See more of our full-service events and rentals firm.

FactorInfo.Title: Our Many Services That Fits Your Needs
FactorInfo.Description: Here are our services. Feel free to choose any of them and give us a call. We're always ready to answer you.

Items.Name: Imports and Exports
Items.Description: We aspire to grow our business by recognizing and adapting to market changes and customer demands and to being one of the major players in the Imports and Exports sector by importing various kinds of electronic equipment, household items, hard ware and general goods.  Items needed would be ordered and delivered in a timely manner as agreed.

Items.Name: Bus and Car Rentals
Items.Description: We provide solutions to your temporary transportation needs by using very modern vehicles with professional drivers who have the experience in traveling across the country to satisfy the peculiar needs of both our prospective and existing clients.

Items.Name: Camp Catering, Hospitality and Cleaning
Items.Description: We have experts in camp management services including catering, hospitality and maintenance management. We engage in ‘meet and greet’ services for our clients which save them time and we do commercial cleaning services for offices, workshops, factories, households etc.  In today’s highly competitive global environment, our personnel have been carefully screened, selected and trained to render quality service.

Items.Name: Accommodation Services
Items.Description: Accommodation service managers plan, organize, direct, control and evaluate the operations of an accommodation establishment or of a department. So at Jobex Events, we make your safety our #1 Priority!
